Mod.name: Copi's Choose Your Own Loadout
Mod.description:
[img]https://i.imgur.com/5aDRWYk.png[/img]
Select any equipment you would like in the mod settings, and spawn with it next time you start a run! You can change any statistic of your starter wands within the default ranges, choose what spells may spawn on your wands, and even pick your starting flask!
Thanks to [url=https://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561198165288511/myworkshopfiles/?appid=881100]Horscht[/url] for help with the mod settings!
